channel.title: The Dom :: Introduction to Web Dev
channel.description: You may remember from earlier chapters that classes represent specific entities. The Document Object Model (DOM) is a set of objects that represent the browser and the documents that make up the web page. The DOM objects are instances of classes that model the structure of the browser, HTML document, HTML elements, element attributes, and CSS. The below figure depicts the parent-child relationships between the DOM objects that make up a web page.
